Entry.Name: Default Scheme Http
Entry.Description: By using the HttpHost.DEFAULT_SCHEME_NAME in the HttpHost class, the app does not use TLS to encrypt the traffic. This allows a malicious actor to read and modify any ongoing network traffic.

Mitigation.Textual: Please change Default Scheme Name to 'https'.
Mitigation.Code Snippet:
1. Open an IDE (e.g., Android Studio);
2. Search for the 'HttpHost.DEFAULT_SCHEME_NAME' in the code;
3. Set HttpHost.DEFAULT_SCHEME_NAME = 'https'.
